com.cyc.session

Interface SessionConfigurationLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigurationLoader, EnvironmentConfigurationLoader, PropertiesConfigurationLoader, SimpleInteractiveLoader

    public interface SessionConfigurationLoader
    This interface defines a mechanism for loading CycSessionConfigurations. Implementations may load configuration from System properties, Properties files, interactive dialogs, etc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CycSessionConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns a new CycSessionConfiguration.
      String getName()
      The convenience name of this implementation, making it easier to specify a particular configuration loader in System properties (or properties files, or whatever.) This name may be almost anything, but should be reasonably descriptive: "interactive," "default-properties," etc.
      boolean isCapableOfSuccess()
      Whether the SessionConfigurationLoader believes it has a chance of success.
      void setEnvironment(EnvironmentConfiguration config)
      Passes an EnvironmentConfiguration to the configuration loader.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        The convenience name of this implementation, making it easier to specify a particular configuration loader in System properties (or properties files, or whatever.) This name may be almost anything, but should be reasonably descriptive: "interactive," "default-properties," etc.

        Names may only consist of alphanumeric character, underscores, and hyphens (i.e., /^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$/). Spaces are now allowed.

        Returns:
        The convenience name of the implementation.

      • getConfiguration

        CycSessionConfiguration getConfiguration()
                                         throws SessionConfigurationException
        Returns a new CycSessionConfiguration. The resulting CycSession may not be sufficient to create a new CycSession; that's for the SessionManager to determine. This method will throw a SessionConfigurationException if configuration parameters are obviously malformed; however, the configuration loader may allow missing or empty parameters, at its discretion.

        Note that setEnvironment(com.cyc.session.EnvironmentConfiguration) must be called sometime before calling this method.

        Returns:
        a new CycSessionConfiguration
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException - if configuration parameters are obviously malformed. However, the configuration loader may allow missing or empty parameters at its discretion.

      • setEnvironment

        void setEnvironment(EnvironmentConfiguration config)
        Passes an EnvironmentConfiguration to the configuration loader. Parameters in the EnvironmentConfiguration may instruct the loader on what to do (or what not to do.)
        Parameters:
        config -

      • isCapableOfSuccess

        boolean isCapableOfSuccess()
        Whether the SessionConfigurationLoader believes it has a chance of success. This is only a check for obvious failure modes; for example, a GUI-based loader would return false when being executed in a headless environment.
        Returns:
        Whether the SessionConfigurationLoader believes it has a chance of success.
